website_summaries.verdict: Those looking to save a few dollars while extending a suntan should check out this moisturizing product.
pros: Moisturizing ingredients for silky soft skin
Formula in 18.75-ounce bottle lasts for months
Customers rave over the lotion's amazing smell

customer_reviews.title: Meh...and smells
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for this lotion. Felt like it didn't moisturize very well and I did become very itchy while using it. Can't say for certain if it was this lotion or the tanning bed lotion I bought and started using at the same time. But I can say this didn't help. The smell wasn't my cup of tea either. Wasn't horrible, but not a pleasant smell to me. Almost like an old light perfume scent thrown into the bottle to mask the chemically smell of the lotion. However, I could smell both. I returned and got a diff lotion that works much better.
